title: Zeek - Miscellaneous
description: - This dashboard provides details for Dynamic Protocol Detection Failures, weirds, LDAP, and LDAP search.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides details for Dynamic Protocol Detection Failures, weirds, LDAP and LDAP search.

## Widgets
1. Types of Protocol for the Violation
2. Top Analyser that Generated the Violation
3. Dynamic Protocol Detection Log Details
4. No. of Weird Logs that Turned into a Notice
5. Top 10 Names of Weird
6. Top 10 Peers that Originated the Weird
7. Weird Log Details
8. LDAP Versions
9. Top 10 LDAP Operation Codes
10. Top 10 Arguments
11. Top 10 Objects
12. LDAP Log Details
13. Search Scopes
14. Top 10 Search Filters
15. Top 10 Search Base Objects
16. LDAP Search Log Details

definition.title: Types of Protocol for the Violation
Top Analyser that Generated the Violation
No. of Weird Logs that Turned into a Notice
Top 10 Peers that Originated the Weird
